name: Coca-Cola European Partners plc
goal:
Coca-Cola European Partners (CCEP) – (NYSE / EURONEXT Amsterdam and London / MADX : CCE) is a major fast-moving consumer goods business in Europe and the world’s largest independent Coca-Cola bottler by revenue. Across 13 countries in Western Europe, our 23.500 employees make, sell and distribute the world’s most loved drinks brands to more than 300 million people. We offer Coca-Cola, Diet Coke/Coca-Cola Light, Coke Zero, Coca-Cola Life, Fanta and Sprite. Our portfolio also includes energy drinks, waters, juices, sports drinks and ready-to-drink teas.

In 2017 we launched This is Forward – the Sustainability Action Plan from The Coca-Cola Company in Western Europe and Coca-Cola European Partners. We are taking action on sustainability by using our business and our brands to build a better future, for people and the planet.

For more information, visit www.ccep.com
